scripts.build:all: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:happ && npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:playground
scripts.devtest: npm run build:all && concurrently "npm run build:watch -w webcomponents" "npm run build:watch -w playground/webapp" "npm run start:mem"
scripts.start:happ:mem: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate tasker.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a hTasker network mem
scripts.start:happ:proxied: RUST_LOG=trace WASM_LOG=trace echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate tasker.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a hTasker network --bootstrap https://bootstrap.holo.host/ webrtc wss://signal.holo.host
scripts.start: cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ:proxied" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui -w playground/webapp"
scripts.start:mem: cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ:mem" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui -w playground/webapp"
